description.raw:
Add API for setting shadow texture size. Larger shadow texture size generally produces higher quality shadows.

Not part of this PR is a `ShadowPlugin` in `shadow_texture_plugin_7` branch that I created to demonstrate the functionality. If you're interested in trying it out, you can switch to that branch and run:

~~~
gazebo worlds/box_shadow_plugin.world
~~~

Bring up the camera sensor image in Topic Viewer and see that the shadows have reduced in quality (size changed from 1024 to 256).

jenkins:

[xenial-nvidia](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/64/) - should be ok. The test failures look unrelated
